text: Vernier is a municipality of the canton of Geneva in Switzerland. It has villages of Vernier Village, Le Lignon, Aïre, Les Avanchets, Cointrin and Châtelaine. As of 31 December 2016, 34,983 people lived there. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of Vernier Category:Cities in Switzerland Category:Municipalities of Geneva
title: Vernier
